ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Anyone notice the lack of bashing?
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh please tell me it is so!  I am so sick of being bashed for 1 by some stupid lvl 6 skeleton as I run across Nek I could scream. Kit ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
Oh please tell me it is so! I am so sick of being bashed for 1 by some
stupid lvl 6 skeleton as I run across Nek I could scream.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Monday, March 27, 2000 10:56 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Anyone notice the lack of bashing?


From: <kim@...>

I gave Raiel the heads up on this after I noticed it in the
patch. I have only been bashed once since the patch, and that
was by an enchanter animation (with a shield). Raiel says
he's only been bashed by ogre guards in Najena, and ogres are
supposed to have it as a innate ability.

You think they finally fixed it so the bash limitations are
the same for mobs as for players?

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
